entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
